biotools.summary: Welcome to Stoat, the environmental data annotation tool, a data fusion engine design to annotate biodiversity records with environmental remote sensing products. This tutorial provides a step-by-step guide to using the tools to explore, upload, manage, annotate, and download data.

bioschemas.name: STOAT
